Function reference

Basic functions with vectors and matrices

Product

Compute distinc matrix multiplications matrix-matrix, matrix-verctor, cross-product,…

bdblockmult()
Block matrix multiplication
bdblockmult_hdf5()
Block matrix multiplication with hdf5 datasets
bdblockmult_sparse()
Block matrix multiplication
bdblockmult_sparse_hdf5()
Block matrix multiplication
bdblockmult_vector()
Block matrix-vector multiplication
bdCrossprod()
Crossproduct
bdCrossprod_Weighted()
Matrix Crossprod with R-objects
bdCrossprod_hdf5()
Crossprod with hdf5 matrix
bdtCrossprod()
Crossproduct
bdtCrossprod_Weighted()
Block matrix multiplication
bdtCrossprod_hdf5()
Transposed Crossprod with hdf5 matrix
bdScalarwproduct()
Matrix - Weighted Scalar Multiplication with numerical data
bdwproduct()
Matrix - Weighted vector Multiplication with numerical matrix
bdWeightedProduct_hdf5()
Apply weights to a dataset in hdf5 file
blockmult()
Block matrix multiplication

Normalization

Matrix normalization

bdNormalize_Data()
Normalize matrix
bdNormalize_hdf5()
Normalize dataset in hdf5 file

Other functions

bdparallelVectorSum()
Sumarize vector

Write diagonal matrix
bdgetDim_hdf5()
Get dataset dimensions

Write diagonal matrix

Write Upper/Lower triangular matrix

Get sd and Mean by Rows or Columns
bdparallelpow2()
Pow vector
bdblockSum_hdf5()
Block matrix multiplication with hdf5 datasets
bddtrsm()
Solves matrix equations : A*X = B

Lineal algebra functions

bdSVD()
k first SVD components for DelayedArray
bdSVD_hdf5()
Block SVD decomposition for hdf5 files using an incremental algorithm.
bdSVD_lapack()
Complete SVD with Lapack Functions for RObjects
bdQR()
QR Decomposition
bdInvCholesky()
Inverse Cholesky
bdInvCholesky_hdf5()
Compute inverse cholesky with hdf5 data files
bdpseudoinv()
Pseudo-Inverse
bdSolve()
Solve matrix equations

Data Analysis

bdPCA_hdf5()
PCA Descomposition
bdlm_paral()
Linear regression using MLR-MR algorithm

HDF5 data file utils

bdRemovelowdata()
Remove SNPs in hdf5 omic dataset with low data
bdget_maf_hdf5()
Get minor allele frequency
bdremove_maf_hdf5()
Remove SNPs in hdf5 omic dataset with low data
bdImpute_snps_hdf5()
Impute SNPs in hdf5 omic dataset

Create hdf5 data file and write data to it
bdAdd_hdf5_matrix()
Write matrix to existing hdf5 file
bdSplit_matrix_hdf5()
Split hdf5 dataset
bdSort_hdf5_dataset()
Sort existing dataset
bdReduce_matrix_hdf5()
Reduce hdf5 dataset
bdBind_hdf5()
Bind matrices by rows or columns
bdapply_Function_hdf5()
Apply function to different datasets inside a group
bdcomputeMatrixVector_hdf5()
Apply vector calculus to a dataset in hdf5 file
bdgetDatasetsList_hdf5()
Gets all dataset names inside a group
bdRemove_hdf5_element()
Remove element group or dataset from hdf5 file
bdCreateLink_hdf5()
Create hard link between two datasets
bdCreateGroup_hdf5()
Create groups
bdCreateEmptyDataset_hdf5()
Create groups
bdExists_hdf5_element()
Exists hdf5 element
bdImportData_hdf5()
Import data from url or a file
bdWriteDimnames_hdf5()
Write dimnames in HDF5
bdImport_text_to_hdf5()
Converts text file to hdf5 data file
